## Workspace.handleLinkContextMenu() method

Add a context menu to internal file links.

 0.12.10

**Signature:**

```typescript
handleLinkContextMenu(menu: Menu, linktext: string, sourcePath: string, leaf?: WorkspaceLeaf): boolean;
```
